text:
@dougducey @VP @CDCgov @ASU @michaelcrow How is it that you have on water "misters" in patio restaurants when #coronavirus is spread by droplets?! Oh yeah that makes sense Masks have become recommended by the CDC. 
@VickyNguyenTV shows us an eyeopening look at the effectiveness of masks. https://t.co/VMzTz6Aequ

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
